Class Campus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Campus
  • public class Campus
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates our Campus.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private AcadBlock acadBlock

      Number of hostels in the campus

      The hostels in the campus
      (package private) static int MAX_NUMBER_OF_HOSTELS
      The maximum number of hostels the campus can currently support Currently our new campus can only support 10 hostels

      Campus name

    • Constructor Detail

      • Campus

        public Campus​(java.lang.String name,
              AcadBlock acadBlock)
        Constructor for Campus. Initialize the instance variables. Initially our campus will have no hostels and 1 academic block.
        Parameters:
        name - Stores the campus name
        acadBlock - Object representing academic block

               throws MaximumCapacityException
        Adds a hostel to the campus.
        Parameters:
        hostelName - The name of the hostel being added
        Throws:

      • calculateRepairingCost

        public int calculateRepairingCost()
        Calculate the repairing cost of the entire campus
        Returns:
        an integer equal to the cost of repairing the campus

      • calculateAverageRepairingCost

        public float calculateAverageRepairingCost()
                                    throws DivideZeroException
        Calculate the average repairing cost of the entire campus
        Returns:
        a float equal to the average repairing cost of the campus per hostel
        Throws:
        DivideZeroException
